template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the fintech space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research investing basics, then create a consistent campaign of blog posts, videos, emails, and social content to drive engagement and generate leads.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt for a fintech content campaign task. Let me break down their requirements. They mentioned research, multi-format creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals. Need to keep it under 45 words and in plain English.

Hmm, fintech space… maybe focus on a specific topic like investing. Multi-format could include blog posts, videos, emails, and social media. Consistency across channels means maintaining the same message and branding. Measurable goals—maybe engagement and lead generation.

Wait, should I include all elements without being too wordy? Let me try combining: start with the research aspect, then list the formats, emphasize consistency, and end with the goals. Keep it concise. Check the word count… yeah, that should fit.
